text: My wife came to see this Doctor Henry because of migraine. But after seeing the doctor, she felt more sick! Dr Henry was very arrogant. He didn’t even assess my wife properly and kept insisting that “healthcare workers must take care of patients” not kept taking MC. My wife tried to finish her shift even though not feeling well. Then the next day see the doctor. But instead of getting better, because of this arrogant doctor, my wife became more unwell and some more embarassed during the check-up. To all the healthcare workers, who are feeling exhausted and sick, do not come and see this doctor. NOT WORTH IT.

Probably the best doctor in this Yishun, Khatib area. Dr Chan shows genuine care and concern for his patients and also give tips to living life healthily and to its fullest potential. Along with his wife and staff, all of them are always positive..your mood will be lifted even when you are sick.

Chan refused to provide me with MC for a fever that subsided the night before unless i paid 40 dollars for his diarrhea medicine. He also kept hinting that my illness wasn't real and that i just wanted to fake an MC. He made zero effort to hide his greed for money and kept insisting that 40 dollars was not a high price to pay for medicine (that i didn't need). Never met such a greedy and rude doctor in my life.
Would recommend this clinic. Doctor Henry is very caring and give the right diagnose to his best knowledge. The nurses are warm and friendly too.
The doctor no good experience waste people time went there for right hip pain tendon of lower leg strain request for 3 days MC to rest but oni give 2 useless doctor but the aunty at counter very nice
